label: 黄楊木
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
説明文: Buxus microphylla. A yellow and extremely tight-grained wood uesd decoratively in high quality woodwork. In the Shōsō-in, it is used in boxes, as an inlay in marquetry, for the pegboxs or headpieces on biwa, and for other works of fine craftsmanship. [正倉院、琵琶]
